mapper.insert: insert into workInfo SELECT conCat('W',subStr(contractID,3)) as workInfoID,contractID,#{workMonth} as workMonth,#{workStartDay} as workStartDay ,#{workEndDay} as workEndDay,#{workTime} as workTime,null ,date_format(now(),'%Y%m%d'),null FROM contract WHERE employeeID=#{employeeID} AND #{workStartDay} between contractBeginDate and contractEndDate
mapper.select: select max(w.workMonth) as workMonth from ems.workinfo w inner join ems.contract c winfo.ctractID = c.ctractID where c.employeeID = #{employeeID} group by c.employeeID
